backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister implementing land minting logic, user profiles, loot caches, modifiers, and various game-related data structures.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for fully reinstalling Land and Asset canisters on mainnet and performing complete re-initialization with required admin and canister IDs.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist outlining required environment setup and `.env` configuration for the CyberGenesis frontend.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide describing prerequisites and the full sequence for deploying the Land Mint DApp and associated canisters.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: High-level deployment instructions emphasizing environment configuration and correct canister deployment order.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing CyberGenesis architecture, canister roles, and system interactions for the multi-canister DApp.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide listing required environment variables for the frontend `.env` file, focusing on network settings and canister IDs.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for configuring environment variables and deploying backend canisters to fix missing or misconfigured asset canister issues.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented frontend background shader features and configuration requirements for CubeVisualization.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of frontend file summaries detailing component purposes, UI behavior, animation systems, and 3D scene configuration.
frontend/.env: Production environment configuration for IC mainnet specifying all required canister IDs, network settings, and stability-related parameters.
frontend/.env.example: Template `.env` file showing required environment variables for network configuration, canister IDs, debugging, and admin authorization.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx with no-cache directives.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, profile setup flow, and reinitialization UI states.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister including assets, profiles, roles, and all service methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the asset backend canister interface for asset operations, admin controls, and user profiles.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main backend canister defining land data, modifiers, rewards, loot, profiles, and administrative methods.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin-only GLB model upload component with authorization checks, canister health verification, and upload management UI.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Simplified admin panel handling GLB uploads with health checks, file validation, and simulated upload progress.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostics tool running tests on asset and land canisters, logging results, and checking actor state and connectivity.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Admin-only tool that checks, reinitializes, and validates the health of the Asset Canister with step-based status tracking.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs multi-gateway health checks for Land and Asset canisters, measuring response times and generating status reports and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays whether environment variables for canister IDs match known correct IDs and highlights mismatches.
Validates required environment variables at runtime and shows a blocking error banner when configuration is incomplete.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D starfield and nebula background using canvas with optimized drawing and resize handling.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Implements a 3D biome viewer using React Three Fiber with custom lighting, sky shader, bloom effects, and biome-specific model loading.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file; all rendering logic was moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks health of Land and Asset canisters, shows status, and refreshes periodically with UI indicators and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Handles loot cache discovery and processing, including cost checks, balance validation, and interaction with canister actor methods.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that logs caught errors and displays a styled fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Provides staking, proposal creation, and voting UI backed by query hooks and mutation calls with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land stats, rewards, cooldowns, upgrades, modifiers, and admin tools while syncing with canister data via hooks.
Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and renders a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies biome‑based PBR material tweaks, and auto‑fits the camera to the model.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Displays land details with biome names and navigation buttons to switch between available lands.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and displays the top 10 lands with rank styling, token balances, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive map with drag, zoom, and pinch gestures, centering on the user’s land and drawing biome-colored markers.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Implements a marketplace for lands and modifiers with filters, buying, listing, and cancellation logic.
Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Performs periodic health checks against the asset canister, tracks latency and connection status, and displays real‑time diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders an animated 2D canvas with bouncing particles and connecting lines, handling resize and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides UI to edit a land plot's name and decoration URL, syncing with backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Displays a Plug wallet connect button or a dropdown with principal info and disconnect actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile by submitting a name with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Shows a full‑screen overlay indicating connection reinitialization progress and gateway rotation.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with reset capability.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines mainnet config, canister IDs, model URLs, and validation utilities for production deployment.
Provides a React context for detecting, connecting, disconnecting, and using the Plug wallet, including actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Defines a static placeholder catalog of modifiers with IDs, names, rarity tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for governance backend interfaces, proposals, votes, and result variants.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the governance backend service, records, and variant types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Hook that retries actor creation across multiple gateways with delays and user notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Extended actor hook that tracks initialization, polls backend readiness, and provides status and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Validates env vars and builds an asset canister actor with gateway health checks and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Performs a delayed one-time health check on the asset canister and returns a simple health status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Uploads GLB files to the asset canister using Plug wallet, tracking progress and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes a governance canister actor with Internet Identity, retry logic, and gateway failover.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for logging in with Internet Identity and managing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes a marketplace canister actor with Internet Identity, retry handling, and gateway selection.
Defines generic and specific React Query mutation hooks for executing token, marketplace, and governance canister transactions via the Plug Wallet.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder governance/marketplace types.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes and retries creation of a token canister actor with automatic gateway selection and timeout handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining dark theme variables, fonts, neon effects, and glassmorphism UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Generates build metadata, provides cache‑busting utilities, and logs build details during app startup.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Implements 3D debugging utilities including logging, GPU diagnostics, renderer detection, and scene stability checks.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty file or placeholder for future model‑loading utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides helpers to format and parse token amounts with fixed decimals and optional separators, plus balance checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for marketplace canister interactions including listings, item types, and buy results.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL for the marketplace canister defining item types, listing records, buy results, and service methods.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders a modifier collection view with rarity tiers, counts, and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard handling land data loading, tab navigation, and rendering feature components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with animated UI and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Displays land initialization status and loading indicators before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Shows canister ID verification UI with background effects and navigation link.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for token canister ICRC-1 operations, transfer errors, metadata, and admin methods.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service methods for token operations including balance, transfer, metadata, supply, and minting.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript declarations for WebGPU interfaces to enable API usage without type errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, asset handling (including WASM), build timestamping, and dev server proxying.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, shader‑background goals, and pending requests for a Three.js gradient background.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment guide providing project overview, requirements, and quick-start instructions.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet‑focused script to upload .glb assets to the AssetCanister with rate limiting and verification.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local script to batch‑upload tiered 3D model assets to an AssetCanister using dfx.
unknown.txt: Contains a fragment referencing testing a health endpoint.
